Class GameCharacterAnimated2D

java.lang.Object
vista2D.AnimatedEntity2D
vista2D.GameCharacterAnimated2D
Direct Known Subclasses:
MummyAnimated2D, PlayerAnimated2D
public class GameCharacterAnimated2D extends AnimatedEntity2D
Clase que renderiza un GameCharacter (momia o player)

Guillermo Lazzurri

  • Constructor Details

    • GameCharacterAnimated2D

      public GameCharacterAnimated2D(GameCharacter character, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Animation<com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion>[] animation)
      Constructor de clase, llama a super(character, animation[TileMapGrafica2D.IDDLE]);
      Parameters:
      character - GameCharacter a ser dibujado
      animation - array con las animaciones correspondientes a los estados del caracter. Debe contener 5 animaciones correspondientes a
      TileMapGrafica2D.IDDLE = 0;
      TileMapGrafica2D.FALL = 1;
      TileMapGrafica2D.WALK = 2;
      TileMapGrafica2D.DEATH = 3;
      TileMapGrafica2D.JUMP = 4;
